# Class fields UnifiedDocument.Code.Section.SectionClass_title=Title
# Sheet keys section.sheet.description=This page controls how Section name pages are displayed in both view and edit modes. section.sheet.noObject=The current page doesn't have the expected Sections object. section.sheet.noFields=The Section names application doesn't have any fields to display.
